thread.title_full: United Bank donates to Monroe County Law Enforcement Foundation | News | mymcr.net

title: United Bank donates to Monroe County Law Enforcement Foundation | News | mymcr.net
text:
United Bank recently presented a $25,000 check to the Monroe County Law Enforcement Foundation as a part of the Georgia Law Enforcement Strategic Support Act. The donation supports the Monroe County Sheriff’s office.
“We’re proud to make a contribution that supports our local law enforcement and the good work they do within our community,” explained Cole Davis, President of United Bank in Forsyth. “This contribution will allow the Monroe County Sheriff’s Office to obtain critical equipment and training, strengthening their ability to protect and serve the citizens of Monroe County.”

The donation supports the Monroe County Sheriff’s office. “We’re proud to make a contribution that supports our local law enforcement and the good work they do within our community,” explained Cole Davis, President of United Bank in Forsyth. “This contribution will allow the Monroe County Sheriff’s Office to obtain critical equipment and training, strengthening their ability to protect and serve the citizens of Monroe County.”
